summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Neighborhood Parks, Green Spaces, Trails and Zoo Levy; authorizing the acquisition of a portion of a condominium unit located within the International District Village Square 2 condominium project for an expansion of the International District/Chinatown Community Center; authorizing acceptance of the property for park and recreation purposes; and increasing appropriations to the Department of Parks and Recreation in the 2006 Budget; all by a three fourths vote of the City Council.
